title: [Resolved] 25/08/2017 Log in issues
body:
Hi everyone, 

We are aware of log in issues and are working on a resolution. I will keep this thread updated as we learn more. You can also get updates from here - http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce

*edit ranked queues, log in and store should be up and running now.

replies.body: The login issue I just had is now fixed, but ranked is closed. What's going on???

can log in now but the client says i'm in game when i'm not
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Hope it fix soon so I can continue playing on smurf
you have a blue account :O. Does it dance much
what do you mean ? blue account ?
